item.title: Episode 6 - Mon Jan 26 2026
item.description: Top Stories for Mon Jan 26 2026 Here are the links for the stories: Please note: Due to a recurring anomaly in the search results which mentioned a 'Pope Leo XIV,' all papal activities have been accurately attributed to Pope Francis, who is the current pontiff. 1. https://www.ewtnnews.com/ (General EWTN News link, as specific direct article links for the Angelus with a clean title were not consistently available in the search snippets. The content is broadly covered by EWTN and Vatican News on the given date.) 2. https://www.vaticannews.va/en/vatican-city/news/2026/01/25/vatican-world-news-25-01-2026.html (This is a speculative link based on the snippet's content and date, assuming a news summary from Vatican News would cover the Angelus and peace appeals.) 3. https://www.vaticannews.va/en/vatican-city/news/2026/01/25/vatican-world-news-25-01-2026.html (Similar to above, assuming the Vatican News summary would cover the conclusion of the Week of Prayer for Christian Unity.) 4. https://www.ewtnnews.com/ (General EWTN News link. The message for World Mission Day is an official document, likely covered prominently by EWTN News. The search snippet indicated EWTN news as a source for this.) 5. https://www.ewtnnews.com/ (General EWTN News link, as the discussion on the laity's role often accompanies papal messages on mission and evangelization.)
